urls.title: Kris the Chatbot
urls.description: The bot that's always here for you Meet Kris, the friendly Singapore Airlines chatbot who has been trained to help you with a range of common travel topics such as baggage allowances, lounge eligibility, status of waitlisted flights, and many more. Before you leave for the airport, get Kris to make sure the flight is departing on schedule. Are you still on the redemption waitlist or is the flight available for confirmation? Kris knows. How heavy can your baggage be? How many pieces can you bring? Let

data.text: @BearTravels83 Hi David, if we may share, lounge access depends on your class of travel and the type of frequent flyer programme you are a member of. If you are flying on a Singapore Airlines operated flight, you may check your lounge eligibility with our chatbot(https://t.co/HrkfsqA8SJ). (1/2)

data.text: @liaaestrada8 Hi Lia, you may contact your local Singapore Airlines office via https://t.co/Gaa2WQV7vl for our reservations team to see how best to assist. Kindly note that only a limited number of bassinets are available on board and offered on a first-come, first-served basis. Thank you.

data.text: @JesseBouman Hi Jesse, if your intended destination does not require a PCR test for entry, you will not need one to travel. You are also not required to wear a face mask on board, unless you are travelling to or from destinations that require a face mask due to local regulatory requirements.
